mapper.select: SELECT a.`account_id`, t.`terminal_deviceuid` ,a.`account_name`,g.`carSeriesName` FROM `t_itov_user` u INNER JOIN `t_itov_terminal` t ON u.`user_id`=t.`user_id` INNER JOIN `t_itov_account` a ON a.`account_id`=u.`account_id` INNER JOIN `t_itov_terminal_car` c ON c.`user_id`=u.`user_id` INNER JOIN `t_itov_car` car ON car.`car_id`=c.`car_id` INNER JOIN `t_itov_car_brand_golo3` g ON g.`id`=car.`car_type`
